name: Night Owl Browsing (Dark) (Global)
description:
Do bright websites at night bother you? Would you like every website to look dark? Enable this script for easy midnight surfing. 

Black & White. Minimalist. Dark. Global. Low Light. Night Browsing. Good for forums.
additional_info:
This script is global, meaning that it will do a pretty good job at making most sites look dark. I've tested this on most of the sites I frequent but it is not 100% perfect.

UPDATE 2015
I have created an second Night Owl Browsing Style with a different color set. Try it if you dislike the stark black and white contrast of this theme. https://userstyles.org/styles/128544/night-owl-browsing-2
